definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Sorry, the number you dail is busy now. Please dail it again later.
sentences.chinese: 您好，您所撥打的電話正忙，請稍後再撥。

sentences.english: And don't hesitate to dial 911 if you think you or another family member is in immediate danger.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中有人非常危險，請毫不遲疑地撥打911。

sentences.english: S: Let me call the Emergency Center.
sentences.chinese: 我來撥打急救中心的電話。

sentences.english: Sorry, the subscriber you dialed has set barring of incoming calls.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，您撥打的用戶已設置呼入限制。

sentences.english: They were refused the use of a telephone to call the police, so they bought platform tickets.
sentences.chinese: 這三名男子拒絕撥打電話報警，所以他們買了月臺票。

sentences.english: DDD calls . Please dial "9"first, then the area code and the telephone number .
sentences.chinese: 撥打國內長途，請先撥“9”再撥區號和電話號碼。

sentences.english: At the recording, press desired extension.
sentences.chinese: 在答錄電話上撥打想要的分機。

sentences.english: Let me call the Emergency Center.
sentences.chinese: 我來撥打急救中心的電話。

sentences.english: Call 911 or ask someone else to do so.
sentences.chinese: 撥打911或者叫其他人去打。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new and old customers call our consulting engineer or repair the phone.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老用戶撥打我們工程師的電話諮詢或報修。

sentences.english: Just dial the access number given for the country you're calling from and wait for the prompt.
sentences.chinese: 只需撥打您所在國家的接入號碼並等待提示音。

sentences.english: People called 911 but the rescue vehicles were slow to respond.
sentences.chinese: 人們撥打了911，但是救援車輛反應緩慢。

sentences.english: The subscriber you dial is busy now , please redial later .
sentences.chinese: 您撥打的用戶現在正忙，請稍後再撥。

sentences.english: Suggest the reporter is dialed " 110 " , ask constabulary assistance to settle this matter.
sentences.chinese: 並建議記者撥打“110”，請警察協助解決此事。

sentences.english: Sorry, the number you dialed is not exist, please check it and dial it later.
sentences.chinese: 您好，您所撥打的號碼是空號，請覈對後再撥。

sentences.english: Sorry, the dialed number doesn't exist. Good bye.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，您所撥打的號碼是空號，再見。

definition: to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
special-purpose phone line or communications link/hotline/special rail line (e.g. between airport and city)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
